text: I am not necessarily a fan of Starbucks coffee, nor of flavored coffees, but I have to say that I found this particular coffee very smooth and the flavor was not the usual overpowering, cloying stuff that you usually get when you get a flavored coffee. I use about 7-8 scoops (note: varies with the size of your scoop, mine is about a tablespoon size when heaping, perhaps a touch more) for a 12 cup pot and get a very nice tasting/smelling pot of coffee. I can see having more of this coffee when the current bag is done. P-)
